data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Castellón.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary: On average, 60 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Castellón words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Vinaròs
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Vinaròs, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
Please, convict the 9,644 believers in Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain has a population of 602,300.

We estimate Castellón has 9,644 people who might know Jesus, 455,992 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 136,664 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Castellón who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
